EmailTemplate.name: 201908_BK_Webinar_TruTrak_Integration_and_Onboarding_MC.201908_BK_Webinar_TruTra
EmailTemplate.subject: Join Us For A Webinar Regarding TruTrak Integration And Onboarding
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<[[http://www.bendixking.com/]]> WEBINARTruTrak Integration and Onboarding
Date: September 4th, 2019 Time: 9 AM MDT
TruTrak has long been a leader in low-cost autopilots for experimental and certified aircraft, and now they are part of the BendixKIng family. As valued dealers of TruTrak and BendixKing, we wanted to invite you to a webinar to answer questions and discuss the integration of TruTrak into BendixKing’s product line and how that will affect your business moving forward.
Andrew Barker, Vice President of Americas Aftermarket and Experimental Sales, and Lamonte Macon, Channel Manager, will walk you through the BendixKing dealer agreements, how to start buying new products immediately, what the future integration of TruTrak will look like and basic milestone timing.
Look forward to talking to you on September 4th!
REGISTER HERE <[[https://honeywell.zoom.us/webinar/register/WN_taf-RCOdS1aHpkNx4dLuzw]]>
